units.title: Lentiviral transduction of hiPSCs with FLP under CDH1 promoter
units.text: hiPSCs were transduced with a lentiviral vector encoding FLP under the control of the CDH1 promoter at day 15 before analysis at day 24.
units.rationale: Enables inducible FLP expression for lineage tracing at a defined differentiation stage.

units.title: Lentiviral transduction with FLP under MAB21L2 promoter
units.text: the reporter line were transduced with a lentiviral vector encoding FLP (FLPERT2) under the control of the MAB21L2 promoter at day 3, and after 72 h, we detected HA-tag+CDH1+ cells, indicating correct labeling of the mesothelial layer.
units.rationale: Marks mesothelial cells early in development to track their fate.

units.title: Induction with 4‑hydroxytamoxifen (4‑OHT)
units.text: 4-hydroxytamoxifen (4-OHT) was applied at the beginning of the JCF stage (days 7–8; Fig. 4e and Extended Data Fig. 8a).
units.rationale: Activates the inducible FLP system to permanently label JCF‑derived cells.

units.title: Immunofluorescence analysis of HA‑tagged cells at day 24
units.text: On day 24, immunofluorescence analysis revealed HA-tag+ SMCs and fibroblasts but also CMs (Fig. 5b, Supplementary Video 3 and Extended Data Fig. 9c).
units.rationale: Confirms the differentiation outcomes of labeled progenitors.

units.title: ISL1 immunostaining in human fetal heart tissue
units.text: we performed ISL1 immunostaining in human fetal heart tissue to verify this finding.
units.rationale: Validates the presence of ISL1‑positive cells observed in the organoid model.

units.title: Generation of hiPSC reporter line with FLP/FRT cassette
units.text: a flippase (FLP) recognition target (FRT)-flanked neomycin cassette fused to a hemagglutinin (HA) tag was knocked into the AAVS1 safe harbor locus49 (Supplementary Results and Supplemen- tary Fig. 4a–f).
units.rationale: Creates a stable genetic platform for conditional lineage tracing.

units.title: Differentiation of epicardioids from the FLP/FRT reporter line
units.text: we generated epicardioids from the FLP/FRT-based hiPSC reporter line.
units.rationale: Produces organoid cultures that carry the inducible lineage‑tracing construct.

units.title: Immunodetection of NRP2 blocking antibody
units.text: immunodetection of the NRP2 blocking antibody after treatment indicated its predominant localization in the epicardial layer.
units.rationale: Assesses the spatial distribution of NRP2 inhibition within the organoid.
